field.name: Role
field.definition: the function of a person or organization in regards to creating, providing, supporting, hosting or cataloging the news, event or opportunity

levelAndDeftn.levelDeftn: the function of a person or organization in regards to creating, providing, supporting, hosting or cataloging the news, event or opportunity

terms.termAndDeftn: a person or organization who creates content
a person or organization who catalogs
a person or organization who can provide more information
a person or organization who performs quality control on metadata records
the RSS channel making the content accessible
a person or organization who makes content accessible
a person or organization who hosts or supports news, events or opportunities
a person or organization who accessions metadata records into a collection

dos.practice: Determine a role for each contributor and then select the appropriate role term.
If a person or organization fits more than a single role, complete contributor information again for each different role term needed.
Use the role term Cataloger if compiling (cataloging) the information about the news, event or opportunity

donts.practice: Do not use the role terms of Editor or Validator unless you are part of a cataloging team that is creating a collection.

documentation.obligation: required metadata if parent tag is present

notes.note: This field is an attribute on the contributor field.
